title: Water & Food Planner
description: Estimate daily food and hydration requirements by trip conditions.
pageDescription: Forecast hydration and calorie needs by group size, duration, and effort.

sections.title: Inputs
content: Number of people and trip days.

sections.title: Output
content: Total liters of water for the entire group.

sections.title: Tips
content: Carry a treatment method when refilling from natural sources.
Add extra calories for cold, wind, or high-elevation days.
Do a final water check against known refill points.
